definition: musk deer (Moschus moschiferus)/also called 香獐子
fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: And two long glasses brimmed with muscatel Bubble upon the table.
sentences.chinese: 桌上兩個長腳玻璃盅注滿了麝香葡萄酒，泛着泡沫。

sentences.english: and burned fragrant incense on it, as the Lord commanded him.
sentences.chinese: 在壇上燒了麝香料做的香，是照耶和華所吩咐他的。

sentences.english: French Lavender, Lily of the Valley, Oakmoss, Musk.
sentences.chinese: 法國薰衣草，鈴蘭，橡苔，麝香百合。

sentences.english: Musk is a kind of strong-smelling substance.
sentences.chinese: 麝香是一種有激烈氣息的物質。

sentences.english: It may have been a water-rat I speared.
sentences.chinese: 哦，我踩到了什麼？那或許曾是隻麝香鼠。

sentences.english: A method for the determination of phantolide by using single sweep polarography was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了一種粉檀麝香的單掃描極譜的測定方法。

sentences.english: Apparently, the enzymes in the Civet’s stomach remove some of the bitter coffee taste.
sentences.chinese: 顯然，麝香貓胃裏的酶提純了咖啡的苦味。

sentences.english: Background Shexiang Baoxinwan has been used in treating coronary heart disease(CHD) for over thirty years.
sentences.chinese: 背景麝香保心丸自研發上市至今已達三十餘年之久。

sentences.english: Officials say muskrat holes caused that breach.
sentences.chinese: 官員表示決堤由麝香鼠洞引發。
淡淡的麝香味的古龍水。

sentences.english: Base notes are composed of dewy musk, vanilla, vetiver, and tonka bean.
sentences.chinese: 基本配方包含麝香，香草，巖蘭草和薰豆。

sentences.english: Crossing the mountains, trading tea and salt with antlers and musks.
sentences.chinese: 跨過了千山萬嶺，馱走鹿茸麝香，換來鹽巴茶葉。

sentences.english: They also made the sacred anointing oil and the pure, fragrant incense-the work of a perfumer.
sentences.chinese: 又按做香之法做聖膏油和麝香料的淨香。

sentences.english: But musk ox can only survive in one kind of environment.
sentences.chinese: 但是，麝香牛隻能生存在這種環境裏。

sentences.english: Musk is used for perfumes and stimulant.
sentences.chinese: 麝香被用作香料和興奮劑。

definition: Styrax officinalis or Styrax benzoin/benzoin resin (used in TCM)/Benzoinum
snowdrop bush (Styrax officinalis)/gum storax, used in TCM
to promote estrus/to bring an animal to heat by artificial means
nutmeg (Myristica fragrans Houtt)/mace/Myristicaceae (family of plants producing aromatic or hallucinogenic oils)
musk deer (Moschus moschiferus)/also called 香獐子
